document_title: Kidney cancer: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: The kidneys are bean-shaped organs located on both sides behind the abdominal wall, whose function is to filter blood and create urine. The kidneys are also important for other processes in the body, including regulating blood pressure, balancing water and electrolytes, producing blood cells, and keeping your bones healthy.
subsection_data:
ung thu than.json. Kidney function
The kidneys are bean-shaped organs located on both sides behind the abdominal wall, whose function is to filter blood and create urine. The kidneys are also important for other processes in the body, including regulating blood pressure, balancing water and electrolytes, producing blood cells, and keeping your bones healthy.
